title: The Land & Water Company
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Japanese, Organic, Beer/Wine, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant and bar using locally source produce. Menu contains a few vegan items, including kimchi, miso soup, tsukemono (pickeled vegetables), green roll, and Remy's vegatable pot pie which is a take on the traditional dish with roasted vegetables and a cauliflower puree. Could also request custom vegan sushi.
